title: Shine And Sweet
description:
Description : After dating for one year, my boyfriend suddenly confessed that he had a special ability! Not only does he use it anytime I ask, he can also be summoned at will!
A cute yet forgetful girl and a handsome boyfriend with an ability—what kind of sweet and troublesome love story will unfold?

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 2: I Definitely Won T Lose You
